moves.3. Nc3 Bb4 4. e3 c5 5. Nf3 O-O 6. Bd3 d5: brmichael annotation: Jboy's option of f5 is designed to halt white's bishop/queen attacking h7. It's a sharp move, attacking the kingside. It's reallty an acceptable move though. Safer, and better, would be the simple 9...g6 effecting the same results and eventually helping black's white squared bishop to come into play also. Heck though, f5 looks more fun!
A blunder, I believe. In an even game, and brmichael had offered a draw, black thought to win the queening race. However, with white's king on b7 able to attack on b8, white had the queening advantage.
